name: What's Sub?
description:
This is my Ludum Dare 38 entry about a thief who breaks into a science facility to steal the sub gun prototype. What will happen when he gets the gun?

The game might be buggy at some points. For 1 day of work, this was the best possible quality. Enjoy :D

Controls:

WASD for movement
Space to jump
Hold SHIFT to run
Press C to crouch
Press the left Mouse button to use the gun
Press the right Mouse button to zoom in

The post jam version contains bugfixes, more lighting, music, sounds and new particle effects. Have fun!

Credits:
Background music by http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/473687
